name: vk-dynamic-if-block
description: A dynamic block that shows its inner blocks based on specified conditions, such as whether the current page is the front page or a single post.
author: Vektor,Inc.

scripts.postcss:all: npx postcss src/*.css --use autoprefixer postcss-minify -d build/ --no-map
scripts.build: wp-scripts build && npm run build:css && cp src/*.php build/
scripts.dist: composer install --optimize-autoloader --prefer-dist --no-dev && npm run copy && npm run zip
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/vk-dynamic-if-block && cp -r build dist/vk-dynamic-if-block && cp -r vendor dist/vk-dynamic-if-block && find . -maxdepth 1 '(' -name '*.php' -o -name '*.txt' ')' -exec cp '{}' dist/vk-dynamic-if-block/ ';'
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip -r vk-dynamic-if-block.zip vk-dynamic-if-block && cd ..
scripts.phpunit: npm run build && wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/vk-dynamic-if-block/phpunit.xml --verbose'
